meanings.definition: A type of plant with white, daisy-like flowers and a strong, pleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The field was filled with beautiful camomiles swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I picked some fresh camomiles to make a fragrant bouquet for my mom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the camomiles to decorate its tiny treehouse.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a field of camomiles, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The scent of camomiles in the garden transported me back to my childhood summers.
